divs: Sighting DetailsIt was round in shape with what appeared to be nodules all along the outside of the craft. we were coming home home from Salem, where we had been shopping, my son and I that is, when we spotted it in the sky. It followed us home and hovered over our house. I ran inside to get my new video camera and came back out and put the camera on my husbands truck to steady it and taped it for at least 5 minutes and then it seemed to turn and start to fade and then it just was gone.
